snippet.title: Precipice Full Tour
snippet.description:
Join us as we explore the gameplay of Precipice, our latest Cold War strategy game launching very soon on Steam.  

https://store.steampowered.com/app/951670/Precipice/

Face a highly-responsive, unpredictable AI that will attempt to understand your strategy and counter it at every turn, or invite a friend and see if you can collectively work to avoid global catastrophe.
